participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

ksads_ptsd_raw_754_p.Description: A car accident in which your child or another person in the car was hurt bad enough to require medical attention | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ksads_ptsd_raw_755_p.Description: Another significant accident for which your child needed specialized and intensive medical treatment | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ksads_ptsd_raw_756_p.Description: Witnessed or caught in a fire that caused significant property damage or personal injury | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ksads_ptsd_raw_757_p.Description: Witnessed or caught in a natural disaster that caused significant property damage or personal injury | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ksads_ptsd_raw_758_p.Description: Witnessed or present during an act of terrorism (e.g., Boston marathon bombing) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ksads_ptsd_raw_759_p.Description: Witnessed death or mass destruction in a war zone | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ksads_ptsd_raw_760_p.Description: Witnessed someone shot or stabbed in the community | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ksads_ptsd_raw_761_p.Description: Shot, stabbed, or beaten brutally by a non-family member | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ksads_ptsd_raw_762_p.Description: Shot, stabbed, or beaten brutally by a grown up in the home | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ksads_ptsd_raw_763_p.Description: Beaten to the point of having bruises by a grown up in the home | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ksads_ptsd_raw_764_p.Description: A non-family member threatened to kill your child | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ksads_ptsd_raw_765_p.Description: A family member threatened to kill your child | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ksads_ptsd_raw_766_p.Description: Witness the grownups in the home push, shove or hit one another | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ksads_ptsd_raw_767_p.Description: A grown up in the home touched your child in their privates, had your child touch their privates, or did other sexual things to your child | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ksads_ptsd_raw_768_p.Description: An adult outside your family touched your child in their privates, had your child touch their privates or did other sexual things to your child | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ksads_ptsd_raw_769_p.Description: A peer forced your child to do something sexually | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ksads_ptsd_raw_770_p.Description: Learned about the sudden unexpected death of a loved one | 0 = No; 1 = Yes
